resources.string: Are you sure you would like to log out of PlayPal?

Playpal is designed to provide users with a convenient method of connecting and communicating with each other in order to arrange play dates for their dogs. More specifically, it is intended to provide dogs with new experiences, and to maintain or improve their social behavior, health, and happiness. After all, a healthy pup is a happy pup

Jagdeep is majoring in computer science at Fresno State. He is expected to graduation on December 2021. He has been messing with computers since a young age but got into coding during college and was motivated to pursue a career as a software developer

Luis is majoring in computer engineering at Fresno State. His expected graduation date is December 2021. He does not have a big computer science back ground, but he taught himself how to use Android Studio to help develop this mobile app. He has a 3 year-old dog named Emy whose account you may find while swiping through profiles
Francisco Gomez is majoring in computer science and this project was his first software project.

Mark is majoring in computer science at Fresno State. He is expected to graduate in Spring 2022. He started messing with computers in his high school years and originally wanted to be a computer engineer and changed his mind and applied for computer science for college.

Agustin Valadez is majoring in computer science at Fresno State. He is currently a senior and is expected to graduate in Spring 2022, he enjoys playing video games and watching anime in his free time.
